name: Rayquaza
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

poke_power.name: Speed Gain
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic {R} Energy card or a basic {L} Energy card and attach it to Rayquaza. This power can’t be used if Rayquaza is affected by a Special Condition or if you have another Rayquaza in play.

attacks.name: Sky Judgment
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza.
